context_bundle.summary: Zero-touch deployment for Windows Autopilot, Apple DEP/ABM, and Android Zero-Touch enabling automatic device provisioning without IT intervention

onboarding.quick_start: Register devices with cloud MDM (Intune/Jamf), create deployment profiles, assign to groups, users unbox and device auto-configures
common_patterns: Windows Autopilot: Register hardware IDs, create deployment profile, ESP (Enrollment Status Page)
Apple DEP/ABM: Purchase from authorized reseller, link ABM account to MDM, supervised mode
Android Zero-Touch: Enroll in Google portal, create config, reseller provisions devices
PXE Boot/WDS: Network-based OS deployment for bare-metal at scale
Device naming templates: CORP-{SERIAL} for automatic naming
known_errors: Autopilot requires Intune subscription and Azure AD
Apple DEP devices must be purchased from authorized resellers
ABM device assignment can take 24-48 hours to appear
Autopilot ESP blocks device usage until configuration complete
